meanings.definition: To take for granted or without proof.
meanings.sent1: I assume the sun will rise tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She assumes the bus will be on time.
meanings.sent3: Don't assume the cat will catch the mouse easily.
meanings.sent4: He assumes his team will win the game effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Let's assume the answer is correct for now.

meanings.sent1: I assume the responsibility for the project.
meanings.sent2: She assumes the role of team leader.
meanings.sent3: He assumes the task of fixing the broken chair.
meanings.sent4: The superhero assumes the duty of protecting the city.
meanings.sent5: Let's assume the duty of cleaning up after the party.

meanings.sent1: I assume he will arrive late.
meanings.sent2: She assumes the story is accurate.
meanings.sent3: Don't assume the weather will be sunny all day.
meanings.sent4: He assumes his theory is correct.
meanings.sent5: Let's assume the plan will succeed.
